docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: DISCOVERY of two new classes of antibiotics in recent weeks has drawn attention to the continuing scientific effort to stay one step ahead of the microbes that become resistant to treatment. It has also raised hope that they may someday become powerful weapons in fighting infections.

headline.main: Staying Ahead of Microbes: New Progress
